text: Kare ga, moshi anata gata o rikon shitanaraba, kare wa anata gata ni masaru tsuma-tachi o, kawari ni kare ni sadzuke rarerudearou. Arra ni fukuju, kie shi, shinjin fukaku seijitsude, kaigo shite (fudan ni omoni) kaeri,(kenkyo ni) reihai o sasage, susunde koto ni atari saikai suru mono de, kikon-sha mo ari shojo moarou
